item.description:
Celebrate a holiday luncheon with your faculty and stafff colleagues and Tufts Catering at The Chase Center, Carmichael Hall. Lunch includes an aperitif, first course, second course, entree, dessert & coffee, and great conversation all for under $25 including tip. Treat yourself to 5-star meal for pizza parlor prices with a truly fantastic menu that includes:

Aperitif
Sampling of New England Cheeses and Tufts-made Charcuterie
Cornichons, Candied Pecans and Whole Grain Mustard
Sliced French Bread Crostini, Pecan-Raisin and Rye Breads

First Course
Red Wine Arancini, Melted Fontina
Local Jansel Valley Arugula and Balsamic Fig Syrup

Second Course
Local Heirloom Squash Bisque
Gingerbread Croutons and Pumpkin Seed Oil

Entree
Braised Short Ribs, Truffled Potato Puree, Wild Pennsylvania Mushrooms
Garlicky Kale and Crispy Carrot Ribbons; or
Roasted Atlantic Salmon, Pomegranate Spiced Brown Butter, Four Grain Rice Pilaf and Braised Endive

Dessert & Coffee
Chai Creme Brulee
Tufts Bake Shop Cranberry Biscotti
Decadent Dark and White Chocolate Truffles
New England Coffee Roasters French Roast or Decaf
Tazo Herbal Teas
item.name: Jumbo Annual Holiday Luncheon
